html: (2 Nephi 8:4)."A law shall proceed from me." This law is a teaching or doctrine. Monte Nyman opined that the "law" here spoken of "is undoubtedly the Book of Mormon. This law is associated with judgment in both verses 4 and 5, and it will come forth from the 'isles.' The Book of Mormon is to judge the nations as well as individuals (see 2 Nephi 25:22; D&C 20:13-15.)" (GAWI, 195.)
